short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: IJP Automation helps the user for auto login into job portals based on account selection. And resume views counting

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It helps the user for auto login into our job portals based on account selection. It fetches user credentials from internal database and open the selected account to redirect users on job portals.
